title: Sattviko Mint Makhana Flavor 40 GM | With Anti Oxidants
name: sattviko-mint-makhanas
description: Mint leaves are known to boost digestive health, provide respiratory relief, and show antimicrobial effects. Sattviko Mint Makhana has the goodness of mint along with the protein, fiber, minerals, vitamins, and antioxidants coming from makhana. This 100% sattvic mint snack is ideal for yogis who love the Indian taste palette.
ingredientsDesc: Makhana (66%), Edible Vegetable Oil (Rice Bran), Edible Common Salt, Maltodextrin, Spices & Condiments (Coriander, Dry Mango, Turmeric Powder, Ginger, Clove, Cinnamon, Mace, Cardamom), Mint Powder, Green Chilli Powder, Flavour Enhancer (INS 621), Hydrolysed Vegetable Protein, Acidity Regulator (INS 330), Anticaking Agent (INS 551), Nature Identical Flavouring Substances Added Yogic Herbs: Golden Turmeric, Cardamom, Cinnamon, Black Pepper, Ginger, Clove Holy Basil, Ashwagandha, Lemon, Bay Leaf, Cumin, Beet Root, Licorice

title: Sattviko Peri Peri Makhana 40 GM | With Probiotics
name: sattviko-peri-peri-makhana
description: Sattviko Peri Peri Makhana is a perfect evening and post-yoga snack. The peri peri masala ingredients are 100% sattvic, gluten-free, vegan, and trans-fat-free. It offers 2.4 grams of protein and only 19.9 grams of carbohydrates, which makes it a healthy snack.
ingredientsDesc: Makhana (66%), Edible Vegetable Oil (Rice Bran), Maltodextrin, Edible Common Salt, Sugar, Black Salt, Dehydrated Vegetable Powder (Garlic, Onion), Spices & Condiments (Dry Mango, Coriander, Red Chilli, Carom Seeds, Cumin), Flavour Enhancer (INS 621), Lemon Juice Powder, Acidity Regulator (INS 330), Anticaking Agent (INS 551), Added Natural Colour (INS 160c), Probiotic (Bacillus Coagulans) 500 million CFU per serving, Added Natural Colour (INS 160c), Nature Identical Flavouring Substances.

title: Sattviko Sweet Chilli Makhana 40 GM
name: sattviko-sweet-chilli-makhana
description: Sattviko Sweet Chilli Makhana has a combination of gut-friendly Indian spices like fennel, mace, nutmeg, and fenugreek. These spices combine with fiber, protein, calcium, and magnesium-rich makhanas and make a nutritious and easy-to-digest snack. Additionally, this is a 100% sattvic snack that can be consumed after a yoga session.
ingredientsDesc: Makhana, Olive Oil, Seasonings & Spices (Green Chilli, Dried Onion), Fennel, Mace, Nutmeg, Edible Salt, Sugar, Red Chilli, Fenugreek, Paprika) Added Yogic Herbs: Golden Turmeric, Cardamom, Cinnamon, Black Pepper, Ginger, Clove Holy Basil, Ashwagandha, Lemon, Bay Leaf, Cumin, Beet Root, Licorice

title: Sattviko Sweet Cinnamon Makhana 40 GM
name: sattviko-sweet-cinnamon-makhana
description: This Sweet Cinnamon Makhana contains Cinnamon, Ashwagandha, and Brahmi which are excellent antioxidants and stress relievers. These ayurvedic gems are proven to fight free radicals, calm your mind, and promote good mood. Their combination with makhanas makes the snack a perfect option to munch on after a stressful day. This is a low-carb, high-protein, and high-fiber snack loaded with antioxidants.
ingredientsDesc: Makhana, Olive Oil, Ashwagandha, Brahmi, Seasonings & Spices (Clove, Red Chilli, Lemon, Sugar, Salt), Anticaking Agent (E-551) Added Yogic Herbs: Golden Turmeric, Cardamom, Cinnamon, Black Pepper, Ginger, Clove Holy Basil, Ashwagandha, Lemon, Bay Leaf, Cumin, Beet Root, Licorice

title: Sattviko Caramel Makhana 40 GM
name: sattviko-caramel-makhana
description: This caramel makhana is a high-fiber, high-protein, and low-carb snack perfect for the Indian taste pallet. To add more calcium and magnesium, we've added sesame seeds and cocoa powder. This makhana can be consumed as a post yoga snack because of it sattvic nature.
ingredientsDesc: Sugar (59%), Makhana (17%), Liquid Glucose, Milk Solids, Sesame Seeds (4%), Edible Common Salt, Cocoa Powder, Raising Agent (INS 500(ii)), Emulsifier (INS 322(i)), Natural food Colour (INS 150c), Flavour (Artificial Flavouring Substance - Caramel)

title: Sattviko Pink Salt Makhana 40 GM
name: sattviko-pink-salt-makhana
description: Pink salt contains 84 trace minerals including potassium, magnesium, and calcium, superior to regular iodized salt. Its combination with high-quality, fiber, and protein-rich makhana makes Sattviko's Pink Salt Makhana a perfect snack for summer. Additionally, this is a 100% sattvic snack that can be consumed after a yoga session.
ingredientsDesc: Makhana, Olive Oil, Seasonings & Spices (Black Pepper, Pink Salt) Added Yogic Herbs: Golden Turmeric, Cardamom, Cinnamon, Black Pepper, Ginger, Clove Holy Basil, Ginseng, Lemon, Bay Leaf, Cumin, Beet Root, Licorice

title: Sattviko Chocolate Makhana 40 GM
name: chocolate-makhana
description: The Sattviko Chocolate Makhana is coated in rich, creamy chocolate, creating a perfect balance of crunch and sweetness. This guilt-free snack is high in protein and low in calories, making it an ideal choice for any time of day. It is 100% sattvic, so it can be enjoyed after a yoga session as well.
ingredientsDesc: Sugar, Makhana (13%), Liquid Glucose, Milk Solids, Sesame Seeds (3%), Edible Common Salt, Cocoa Solids, Raising Agent (INS 500(ii)), Edible Vegetable Fat (Hydrogenated), Milk Solids, Emulsifiers (INS 492, INS 322(i)), Natural Food Colour (INS 150c), Nature Identical Flavouring Substances

title: Sattviko Schezwan Makhana 40 GM
name: sattviko-schezwan-makhana
description: Sattviko’s Schezwan Makhana has an authentic flavor of schezwan, making it a tangy and healthy post-yoga snack. This schezwan makhana contains the flavors of clove, cumin, and fenugreek. It offers 3 grams of dietary fiber, 3.2 grams of vegan protein, and a good amount of potassium with each serving.
ingredientsDesc: Makhana, Olive Oil, Seasonings & Spices (Salt, Onion, Clove, Black Pepper, Ginger, Red Chilli, Coriander, Cumin, Fenugreek, Tomato, Paprika, Sugar, Maize) Added Yogic Herbs: Golden Turmeric, Cardamom, Cinnamon, Black Pepper, Ginger, Clove Holy Basil, Ashwagandha, Lemon, Bay Leaf, Cumin, Beet Root, Licorice
